title: Share of IT budgets spent on IT security FY2005-FY2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Fiscal Year in the x axis and Share of total IT budget in the y axis.
Fiscal Year FY2017 has the highest Share of total IT budget and FY2006 has the lowest Share of total IT budget.
There is a difference of 3.4 between the maximum Fiscal Year FY2017 and minimum Fiscal Year FY2006.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Fiscal Year in the x axis and Share of total IT budget in the y axis.
The Share of total IT budget is highest at Fiscal Year FY2017 and lowest at Fiscal Year FY2006.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Fiscal Year in the x axis and Share of total IT budget in the y axis.
Fiscal Year FY2017 has the highest Share of total IT budget and FY2006 has the lowest Share of total IT budget.
There is a difference of 3.4 between the maximum Fiscal Year FY2017 and minimum Fiscal Year FY2006.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Fiscal Year in the x axis and Share of total IT budget in the y axis.
Fiscal Year FY2017 has the highest Share of total IT budget and FY2006 has the lowest Share of total IT budget.
There is a difference of 3.4 between the maximum Fiscal Year FY2017 and minimum Fiscal Year FY2006.
Fiscal Year FY2017 is higher than any other Fiscal Years with value 10.6, followed by FY2016, and FY2015. Down to Fiscal Year FY2006 with the lowest value 7.2.
Fiscal Year FY2005, and FY2007 have a similar Share of total IT budget that is 7.5.
The highest value 10.6 at FY2017 is almost 1.19 times larger than the average value 8.89.
Summing up the values of all Fiscal Years, we get total 115.6.
